"""Write some files and subdirectories in base_dir."""
files = []
cur_dir = base_dir
for i in range(25):
    if i % 3 == 0:
        cur_dir = op.join(cur_dir, 'dir%d' % i)
        os.makedirs(cur_dir)
    filename = op.join(cur_dir, 'foo%s.txt' % i)
    fid = open(filename, 'wt')
    try:
        fid.write('file %d' % i)
    finally:
        fid.close()
    files.append(filename)
return files
